  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_408</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_408</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Razones trigonométricas en un triángulo rectángulo</string>
            <string language="en">Trigonometric ratios in a right triangle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrische Verhältnisse in einem rechten 
Dreieck</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Taux trigonométriques dans une bonne triangle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relações trigonometric em um triângulo 
direito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rapporti trigonometrici in un giusto triangolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Trigonometric αναλογίες σε ένα σωστό τρίγωνο</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones una introducción a la trigonometría. Se estudian las razones trigonométricas de un ángulo agudo y la relación fundamental de la trigonometría.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to introduce trigonometry, the trigonometric ratios of an acute angle and the fundamental law of trigonometry.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">trigonometría</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">razón trigonométrica</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometric ratio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">relación fundamental</string>
            <string language="en">fundamental law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ángulo agudo</string>
            <string language="en">acute angle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Trigonometrie, die trigonometrischen Verhältnisse eines
spitzen Winkels und das grundlegende Gesetz von Trigonometrie 
vorzustellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de présenter la trigonométrie, les taux 
trigonométriques d'un angle aigu et la loi fondamentale de la 
trigonométrie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações 
introduzir o trigonometry, as relações trigonometric de um ângulo 
agudo e a lei fundamental do trigonometry.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
introdurre trigonometria, i rapporti trigonometrici di un angolo acuto
e la legge fondamentale di trigonometria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να καταθέσει trigonometry, τις trigonometric αναλογίες 
μιας οξείας γωνίας και το θεμελιώδη νόμο trigonometry.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">trigonometrisches Verhältnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">grundlegendes Gesetz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">spitzer Winkel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trigonométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">taux trigonométrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">loi fondamentale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">angle aigu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">relação trigonometric</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lei fundamental</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ângulo agudo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trigonometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rapporto trigonometrico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">legge fondamentale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">angolo acuto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">trigonometric αναλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
